headline: Applications open for Ameren bill payment assistance
summary: Income-qualified customers who have fallen behind on their energy bills can apply for payment assistance from Ameren through their local Illinois LIHEAP agency, thanks to a new program offering an additional $150 in support.

raw.headline: Applications open for Ameren bill payment assistance
raw.summary: Income-qualified customers who have fallen behind on their energy bills can apply for payment assistance from Ameren through their local Illinois LIHEAP agency, thanks to a new program offering an additional $150 in support.

headline: Ameren Missouri customers may now qualify for up to $1,400 in bill payment assistance
summary: Ameren Missouri customers who typically qualify for energy assistance may now be eligible to receive up to $1,400 in bill payment assistance across various programs.
